title: Noblewoman's Skirt
artistDisplayName:
Possibly Ngeende or Ngongo, Kuba
Kasaï Province, Democratic Republic of the Congo
medium: Raffia, plain weaves; pieced; appliquéd with plain weaves; embroidered in pearl stitches;  edged with knotted pom-poms
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Edward E. Ayer Endowment, a memorial to Charles L. Hutchinson by his great friend and admirer; Samuel P. Avery and Maurice D. Galleher endowments
